column2: 25-34 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$4$5$I am on haloperidol for bipolar it helps me sleep and prevents my delusional thoughts

35-44 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient) $1$1$3$"I used to take haldol (its shortened name) because of Tourette's syndrome when I was diagnosed at 12 years old. Let me tell you something: THIS. STUFF. SUCKS.

column1: It caused my tics to get worse
column2: made my life even harder because I was being made fun of at school and did nothing to alleviate my symptoms. This stuff did nothing to ease the tics
column3: and made it harder to sleep
column5: and generally difficult to focus and study. I flunked 2 classes when I was on this stuff
column6: something that had NEVER happened before. I will absolutely refuse to ever take this medication again
column7: and I will NEVER recommend it to anybody!"
